statements.query: MATCH (n:EBSVolume)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:EBSVolume)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:EBSVolume)-[r:ATTACHED_TO_EC2_INSTANCE]->(:EC2Instance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
